text: Brie Bella became a new mom days ago, and already friends are showering her & hubby Daniel Bryan with love. Revealing to us EXCLUSIVELY just how thrilled she is for Brie, WWE star Natalya Neidhart gushed about how ‘ spoiled ’ baby Birdie is going to be, AND that she thinks Daniel will be the diaper king! At over 41 weeks pregnant, Brie Bella, 33, FINALLY gave birth to her and her husband Daniel Bryan ‘ s ( real name Bryan Danielson, ) 35, first child on May 9!
